contents.name: AI Game Developer
contents.description: `Unity Editor` and `Unity Runtime` AI integration. Unit Test, Coding, C# Roslyn, Reflection, Assets. Helps to create games with AI. And helps to run AI logic during gameplay.

contents.name: Fluent Behaviour Tree
contents.description: C# behaviour tree library with a fluent API released under MIT.

contents.name: SimpleAI
contents.description: C++11 behaviour tree based library with a QT5 based remote debugger (and with optional LUA bindings) released under MIT.
